          <title>
            <string language="fr">Précurseurs de croissance des plantes</string>
            <string language="en">Plant growth precursors</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Betriebswachstumvorläufer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Precursors do crescimento de planta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Precursori di sviluppo di pianta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόδρομοι αύξησης εγκαταστάσεων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Precursores del crecimiento vegetal</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme montre que des plantes ont besoin de nitrates et de sucre pour fabriquer des protéines pour leur croissance.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates that plants need nitrates and sugar to make proteins for growing.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="fr">croissance</string>
            <string language="en">growth</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">Minerals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">nitrates</string>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">croissance de plante</string>
            <string language="en">plant growth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">protéine</string>
            <string language="en">protein</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">sucre</string>
            <string language="en">sugar</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht, daß Betriebe 
Nitrate und Zucker benötigen, Proteine für das Wachsen zu bilden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra que as plantas necessitam 
nitrates e açúcar fazer proteínas para crescer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra che le piante hanno 
bisogno dei nitrati e dello zucchero di fare le proteine per crescere.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα διευκρινίζει ότι οι εγκαταστάσεις 
χρειάζονται τα νιτρικά άλατα και τα σάκχαρα για να κάνουν τις 
πρωτεϊ'νες για την ανάπτυξη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra que las plantas necesitan 
los nitratos y el azúcar hacer las proteínas para crecer.</string>
          </description>
